abilities.name: Intimidating Roar
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Infernape is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Infernape .

abilities.name: Bright Look
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you put Luxray LV.X from your hand onto your Active Luxray , you may switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flash Impact
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

abilities.name: Magical Return
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may return a Pokémon Tool card or Technical Machine card attached to your Pokémon to your hand. This power can't be used if Mismagius is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Darkness Magic
attacks.effect: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. You can't put more than 8 damage counters in this way.

abilities.name: Big Appetite
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Snorlax is your Active Pokémon, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. If you do, Snorlax is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Exercise
attacks.effect: You may discard as many Energy cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Snorlax.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flying Pikachu during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Fan Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Fan Rotom's type is Colorless until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Spin Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Fan Rotom.

abilities.name: Frost Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Frost Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Crushing Ice
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

abilities.name: Heat Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Heat Rotom's type is Fire until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Warm Up
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Heat Burn
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Mow Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Mow Rotom's type is Grass until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Mow Down
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

abilities.name: Wash Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Wash Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Cleanse Away
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Drain Wash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
